txt.en:
'The Orcs have been leaving caches of weapons for the Dunlendings within the Isendale. I am not sure the Dunlendings actually know who is supplying them, since the Orcs deposit the supplies, then leave before the Dunlendings arrive.

'It is safe to assume, I think, that the Orcs want us fighting each other. In order to disrupt their plans, we need to recover the supplies the Orcs leave for the Dunlendings.

'With the supplies lost, the Dunlending force will be greatly weakened. The supplies can be found atop the hill to the east.'
'I will see that these weapons are disposed of, [placeholder]. No civilized man would dare to use such cruel weapons.'
'Have you collected the Orcs' weapon caches?'
Several weapon caches have been identified throughout the Isendale.
The crates of supplies can be found on the hill east of Innoth's camp.\n\nInnoth asked you to collect several of the Orkish weapon-caches.
Talk to Innoth near the Isen
Innoth is at his camp, west of the weapons-caches.\n\nYou should bring the supplies you recovered to Innoth.
